name: Pearson Exotronics Support Blueprint Package
desc: A set of blueprints that enable heavy industry to produce the support hulls commonly employed by Pearson Exotronics Corporation system fleets.

name: Pearson Exotronics Military Blueprint Package
desc: A set of blueprints that enable heavy industry to produce the rarer military cruisers commonly employed by Pearson Exotronics Corporation system fleets.

name: Pearson Exotronics Core Blueprint Package
desc: A set of blueprints that enable heavy industry to produce the ships common to all Pearson Exotronics Corporation system fleets.
